subcategories.name: Joint state read-outs
subcategories.what_is_covered: Instantaneous articulated joint positions, orientations, angles, velocities
subcategories.typical_examples: joint positions & orientations, joint angles, joint velocities, mesh deformations

subcategories.name: Joint command signals
subcategories.what_is_covered: Low-level motor targets (torque / position / velocity) that drive joint motion
subcategories.typical_examples: joint torque/position commands, continuous motor control signals, PD control torques

subcategories.name: Joint motion trajectories
subcategories.what_is_covered: Time-indexed sequences of joint states the robot follows
subcategories.typical_examples: motion sequences over time, planned joint trajectories, optimised 6-DoF trajectories

subcategories.name: 6-DoF body poses
subcategories.what_is_covered: Position + orientation of whole robots, cameras or objects
subcategories.typical_examples: 6-DoF poses, rigid transformations, UAV 3-D position & orientation

subcategories.name: End-effector pose + gripper
subcategories.what_is_covered: Cartesian pose of manipulator tip plus gripper open/close state

subcategories.name: Steering & pedal commands
subcategories.what_is_covered: Low-level automotive controls for heading and speed

subcategories.name: Wheel / differential-drive velocities
subcategories.what_is_covered: Body-frame linear & angular velocity commands for wheels/actuators
subcategories.typical_examples: linear & angular velocity motor commands, wheel/actuator motions

subcategories.name: Motion trajectories
subcategories.what_is_covered: Pre-planned paths or waypoints for vehicle motion

subcategories.name: Rotor thrust & body-rate commands
subcategories.what_is_covered: Per-rotor thrust/speed or body-rate inputs that place a UAV in 3-D space
subcategories.typical_examples: rotor thrust/speed commands, collective thrust & body-rate inputs
